description:
Tired of that one annoying bug in MSFS 2024? This might be the update you've been waiting for! The first beta for Sim Update 4 (v1.6.3.0) is out, and it comes with an absolutely massive list of 222 fixes!

Join us as we walk through the official release notes to see exactly which bugs have been squashed, from major crash-to-desktop issues to minor aircraft quirks and scenery glitches. 

We're going category by category to see if your biggest frustrations have been addressed.

Even modest updates like this one help keep the skies smooth and the experience immersive. Got thoughts on this patch or issues that still linger? Drop a comment and join the conversation! üëá
